title: Plan Gas Meter Change-Out Program
description: An asset manager needs to plan a program to replace all gas meters that are approaching their end-of-life.

tasks.description: Query the asset database to identify all gas meters scheduled for replacement in the next fiscal year.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of 10,000 meters to be replaced.

tasks.description: Group the meters by geographic area to create efficient work packages for the field crews.
tasks.expected_outcome: System clusters the meters into logical geographic zones.

tasks.description: Develop a schedule and budget for the replacement program.
tasks.expected_outcome: System produces a project plan with a timeline and cost estimate.
